text: Amor Gitano Cover Singel Alejandro Fernández and Beyoncé from the album Viento a Favor, B'Day Deluxe Edition and Irreemplazable Released 2007r. Genre Latin Length 3:48 Label Columbia Records Writer Beyoncé, Jaime Flores, Reyli Barba Producer Rudy Pérez, Beyoncé Alejandro Fernández singles chronology Amor Gitano Beyoncé singles chronology Get Me Bodied (2007r.) Amor Gitano Green Light (2007r.) Viento a Favor track listing Sueño Contigo (10) Amor Gitano (11) Cuando Estamos Juntos (12) B'Day Deluxe Edition CD track listing Check on It (17) Amor Gitano (18) Beautiful Liar (remix) (19) Irreemplazable EP track listing Amor Gitano (1) Oye (2) Amor Gitano (English: "Gypsy Love") is the theme song for the telenovela Zorro: La Espada y la Rosa, performed in Spanish by Alejandro Fernández and Beyoncé. The single was sold mainly in markets with a strong Latin demographic, such as Mexico, where it reached number thirty-eight on its official singles chart and number five on the Digital Sales Chart in late April 2007. ==Charts== Chart (2007) Peak position Argentinian Singles Chart 12 Chilean Singles ChartChile Top 100 "Chile Top 100" 1 Ibero American Singles ChartIbero America Top 100 "Ibero America Top 100" 1 Mexican Singles Chart 38 Mexican Digital Sales Chart 1 Spanish Singles Chart 1 Euro Digital Tracks 5 ==References== Category:Beyoncé songs Category:2007 songs
title: Amor Gitano
